revisions.rev:
{{Infobox Empire Awards | name = 14th | image = 14th Empire Awards logo.jpg | imagesize = | caption = The logo for the 14th Empire Awards | date = {{start date|2009|3|29}} | venue = [[Grosvenor House Hotel]], [[London|London, England]] | host = [[Dara Ã Briain]] | director = | channel = | duration = | issue = | best film = ''[[The Dark Knight (film)|The Dark Knight]]'' | best british film = ''[[RocknRolla]]'' | most awards = ''[[The Dark Knight (film)|The Dark Knight]]'' (3) | most nominations = ''[[Quantum of Solace]]'', ''[[Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street (2007 film)|Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street]]'' and ''[[The Dark Knight (film)|The Dark Knight]]'' (5) | last = 13th | next = 15th }} The '''14th Empire Awards''' (AKA '''Jameson Empire Awards'''), honoring the best in film in 2008, were held on March 29, 2009 at the [[Grosvenor House Hotel]]<ref>{{cite press release |url=http://www.bauermedia.co.uk/Press-Office/News/Jameson-Empire-Awards-2009---Nominations/ |title=Jameson Empire Awards 2009 - Nominations |publisher=[[Bauer Consumer Media]] |date={{start date|2009|3|2}} |accessdate={{start date|2011|9|20}} }}</ref> and hosted by [[Dara Ã Briain]].<ref name="blog">{{cite web |url=http://www.empireonline.com/awards2009/awards-blog/ |title=The Minute-By-Minute Blog |work=[[Empire (film magazine)|Empireonline.com]] |publisher=[[Bauer Consumer Media]] |date={{start date|2009|3|29}} |accessdate={{start date|2011|9|19}} }}</ref> The shortlisted nominees were revealed on March 2, 2009 and finale voting ended on March 12, 2009.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.empireonline.com/News/story.asp?nid=24298 |title=Jameson Empire Award Nominations |author=O'Hara, Helen |work=[[Empire (film magazine)|Empireonline.com]] |publisher=[[Bauer Consumer Media]] |date={{start date|2009|3|2}} |accessdate={{start date|2011|9|19}} }}</ref> Beginning with this year the Empire Awards were sponsored by [[Jameson Irish Whiskey]]. Below is a complete list of nominees and winners. Winners are highlighted in '''bold'''.
==Winners and Nominees== ===Best Film=== '''''[[The Dark Knight (film)|The Dark Knight]]'''''<ref name="film">{{cite web |url=http://www.empireonline.com/awards2009/winners/film.asp |title=Best Film |work=[[Empire (film magazine)|Empireonline.com]] |publisher=[[Bauer Consumer Media]] |date=2009 |accessdate={{start date|2011|9|19}} }}</ref> * ''[[Iron Man (film)|Iron Man]]''<ref name="film"></ref> * ''[[No Country for Old Men (film)|No Country For Old Men]]''<ref name="film"></ref> * ''[[There Will Be Blood]]''<ref name="film"></ref> * ''[[WALL-E]]''<ref name="film"></ref>
===Best British Film=== '''''[[RocknRolla]]'''''<ref name="british">{{cite web |url=http://www.empireonline.com/awards2009/winners/british-film.asp |title=Best British Film |work=[[Empire (film magazine)|Empireonline.com]] |publisher=[[Bauer Consumer Media]] |date=2009 |accessdate={{start date|2011|9|19}} }}</ref> * ''[[Eden Lake]]''<ref name="british"></ref> * ''[[Hunger (2008 film)|Hunger]]''<ref name="british"></ref> * ''[[In Bruges]]''<ref name="british"></ref> * ''[[Son of Rambow]]''<ref name="british"></ref>
===Best Comedy=== '''''[[Son of Rambow]]'''''<ref name="comedy">{{cite web |url=http://www.empireonline.com/awards2009/winners/comedy.asp |title=Best Comedy |work=[[Empire (film magazine)|Empireonline.com]] |publisher=[[Bauer Consumer Media]] |date=2009 |accessdate={{start date|2011|9|19}} }}</ref> * ''[[Burn After Reading]]''<ref name="comedy"></ref> * ''[[Ghost Town (film)|Ghost Town]]''<ref name="comedy"></ref> * ''[[In Bruges]]''<ref name="comedy"></ref> * ''[[Tropic Thunder]]''<ref name="comedy"></ref>
===Best Horror=== '''''[[Eden Lake]]'''''<ref name="horror">{{cite web |url=http://www.empireonline.com/awards2009/winners/horror.asp |title=Best Horror |work=[[Empire (film magazine)|Empireonline.com]] |publisher=[[Bauer Consumer Media]] |date=2009 |accessdate={{start date|2011|9|19}} }}</ref> * ''[[The Mist (film)|The Mist]]''<ref name="horror"></ref> * ''[[The Orphanage (2007 film)|The Orphanage]]''<ref name="horror"></ref> * ''[[The Strangers]]''<ref name="horror"></ref> * ''[[Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street (2007 film)|Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street]]''<ref name="horror"></ref>
===Best Sci-Fi / Superhero=== '''''[[Wanted (2008 film)|Wanted]]'''''<ref name="scifi">{{cite web |url=http://www.empireonline.com/awards2009/winners/sci-fi-superhero.asp |title=Best Sci-Fi/Superhero |work=[[Empire (film magazine)|Empireonline.com]] |publisher=[[Bauer Consumer Media]] |date=2009 |accessdate={{start date|2011|9|19}} }}</ref> * ''[[The Dark Knight (film)|The Dark Knight]]''<ref name="scifi"></ref> * ''[[Hellboy II: The Golden Army]]''<ref name="scifi"></ref> * ''[[Iron Man (film)|Iron Man]]''<ref name="scifi"></ref> * ''[[WALL-E]]''<ref name="scifi"></ref>
===Best Thriller=== '''''[[Quantum of Solace]]'''''<ref name="thriller">{{cite web |url=http://www.empireonline.com/awards2009/winners/thriller.asp |title=Best Thriller |work=[[Empire (film magazine)|Empireonline.com]] |publisher=[[Bauer Consumer Media]] |date=2009 |accessdate={{start date|2011|9|19}} }}</ref> * ''[[Changeling (film)|Changeling]]''<ref name="thriller"></ref> * ''[[Eagle Eye]]''<ref name="thriller"></ref> * ''[[Gone Baby Gone]]''<ref name="thriller"></ref> * ''[[No Country for Old Men (film)|No Country For Old Men]]''<ref name="thriller"></ref>
===Best Actor=== '''[[Christian Bale]] â ''[[The Dark Knight (film)|The Dark Knight]]'''''<ref name="actor">{{cite web |url=http://www.empireonline.com/awards2009/winners/actor.asp |title=Best Actor |work=[[Empire (film magazine)|Empireonline.com]] |publisher=[[Bauer Consumer Media]] |date=2009 |accessdate={{start date|2011|9|19}} }}</ref> * [[Daniel Craig]] â ''[[Quantum of Solace]]''<ref name="actor"></ref> * [[Daniel Day-Lewis]] â ''[[There Will Be Blood]]''<ref name="actor"></ref> * [[Johnny Depp]] â ''[[Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street (2007 film)|Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street]]''<ref name="actor"></ref> * [[Robert Downey, Jr.]] â ''[[Iron Man (film)|Iron Man]]''<ref name="actor"></ref>
===Best Actress=== '''[[Helena Bonham Carter]] â ''[[Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street (2007 film)|Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street]]'''''<ref name="actress">{{cite web |url=http://www.empireonline.com/awards2009/winners/actress.asp |title=Best Actress |work=[[Empire (film magazine)|Empireonline.com]] |publisher=[[Bauer Consumer Media]] |date=2009 |accessdate={{start date|2011|9|19}} }}</ref> * [[Angelina Jolie]] â ''[[Changeling (film)|Changeling]]''<ref name="actress"></ref> * [[Ellen Page]] â ''[[Juno (film)|Juno]]''<ref name="actress"></ref> * [[Olga Kurylenko]] â ''[[Quantum of Solace]]''<ref name="actress"></ref> * [[Sally Hawkins]] â ''[[Happy-Go-Lucky]]''<ref name="actress"></ref>
===Best Director=== '''[[Christopher Nolan]] â ''[[The Dark Knight (film)|The Dark Knight]]'''''<ref name="director">{{cite web |url=http://www.empireonline.com/awards2009/winners/director.asp |title=Best Director |work=[[Empire (film magazine)|Empireonline.com]] |publisher=[[Bauer Consumer Media]] |date=2009 |accessdate={{start date|2011|9|19}} }}</ref> * [[Andrew Stanton]] â ''[[WALL-E]]''<ref name="director"></ref> * [[Coen brothers|Ethan Coen & Joel Coen]] â ''[[No Country for Old Men (film)|No Country For Old Men]]''<ref name="director"></ref> * [[Paul Thomas Anderson]] â ''[[There Will Be Blood]]''<ref name="director"></ref> * [[Tim Burton]] - ''[[Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street (2007 film)|Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street]]''<ref name="director"></ref>
===Best Newcomer=== '''[[Gemma Arterton]] â ''[[Quantum of Solace]]'''''<ref name="newcomer">{{cite web |url=http://www.empireonline.com/awards2009/winners/default.asp |title=Best Newcomer |work=[[Empire (film magazine)|Empireonline.com]] |publisher=[[Bauer Consumer Media]] |date=2009 |accessdate={{start date|2011|9|19}} }}</ref> * [[Hayley Atwell]] â ''[[The Duchess (film)|The Duchess]]''<ref name="newcomer"></ref> * [[Jim Sturgess]] â ''[[21 (2008 film)|21]]''<ref name="newcomer"></ref> * [[Robert Pattinson]] â ''[[Twilight (2008 film)|Twilight]]''<ref name="newcomer"></ref> * [[Toby Kebbell]] â ''[[RocknRolla]]''<ref name="newcomer"></ref>
===Best Soundtrack=== '''''[[Mamma Mia! The Movie Soundtrack|Mamma Mia!]]'''''<ref name="soundtrack">{{cite web |url=http://www.empireonline.com/awards2009/winners/soundtrack.asp |title=Best Soundtrack |work=[[Empire (film magazine)|Empireonline.com]] |publisher=[[Bauer Consumer Media]] |date=2009 |accessdate={{start date|2011|9|19}} }}</ref> * ''[[Quantum of Solace (soundtrack)|Quantum of Solace]]''<ref name="soundtrack"></ref> * ''[[RocknRolla#Soundtrack|RocknRolla]]''<ref name="soundtrack"></ref> * ''[[Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street: The Motion Picture Soundtrack|Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street]]''<ref name="soundtrack"></ref> * ''[[There Will Be Blood (album)|There Will Be Blood]]''<ref name="soundtrack"></ref>
===Done In 60 Seconds Award=== '''''[[Jerry Maguire]]'' by Stephen Power and Conal O'Meara'''<ref name="60seconds">{{cite web |url=http://www.empireonline.com/awards2009/winners/done-in-60-seconds.asp |title=Done In 60 Seconds Award |work=[[Empire (film magazine)|Empireonline.com]] |publisher=[[Bauer Consumer Media]] |date=2009 |accessdate={{start date|2011|9|19}} }}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=http://bcove.me/pylylzp6 |title=Done In 60 Seconds: ''Jerry Maguire'' |work=[[Empire (film magazine)|Empireonline.com]] |publisher=[[Bauer Consumer Media]] |date=2009 |accessdate={{start date|2011|9|19}} }}</ref> * ''[[Cloverfield]]'' by Ewan Smith<ref name="60seconds"></ref><ref>{{cite web |url=http://bcove.me/325x5pjt |title=Done In 60 Seconds: ''Cloverfield'' |work=[[Empire (film magazine)|Empireonline.com]] |publisher=[[Bauer Consumer Media]] |date=2009 |accessdate={{start date|2011|9|19}} }}</ref> * ''[[Pearl Harbor (film)|Pearl Harbour]]'' by Mark C. Wong<ref name="60seconds"></ref><ref>{{cite web |url=http://bcove.me/g3ku24bz |title=Done In 60 Seconds: ''Pearl Harbor'' |work=[[Empire (film magazine)|Empireonline.com]] |publisher=[[Bauer Consumer Media]] |date=2009 |accessdate={{start date|2011|9|19}} }}</ref> * ''[[Seven (film)|Seven]]'' by Ewan Warburton<ref name="60seconds"></ref><ref>{{cite web |url=http://bcove.me/ejf2t1qe |title=Done In 60 Seconds: ''Seven'' |work=[[Empire (film magazine)|Empireonline.com]] |publisher=[[Bauer Consumer Media]] |date=2009 |accessdate={{start date|2011|9|19}} }}</ref> * ''[[The Dark Knight (film)|The Dark Knight]]'' by Steven Seller<ref name="60seconds"></ref><ref>{{cite web |url=http://bcove.me/2bvcpz1i |title=Done In 60 Seconds: ''The Dark Knight'' |work=[[Empire (film magazine)|Empireonline.com]] |publisher=[[Bauer Consumer Media]] |date=2009 |accessdate={{start date|2011|9|19}} }}</ref>

|url=http://bcove.me/mp8i8d5e |title=Done In 60 Seconds: ''American Psycho'' |work=[[Empire (film magazine)|Empireonline.com]] |publisher=[[Bauer Consumer Media]] |date=2009 |accessdate={{start date|2011|9|19}} }}</ref> * ''[[Forrest Gump]]'' by<ref>{{cite web |url=http://bcove.me/95t61xcd |title=Done In 60 Seconds: ''Forrest Gumpt'' |work=[[Empire (film magazine)|Empireonline.com]] |publisher=[[Bauer Consumer Media]] |date=2009 |accessdate={{start date|2011|9|19}} }}</ref> * ''[[Requiem For A Dream]]'' by Charlie Lyne<ref>{{cite web |url=http://bcove.me/8e933ikk |title=Done In 60 Seconds: ''Requiem For A Dream'' |work=[[Empire (film magazine)|Empireonline.com]] |publisher=[[Bauer Consumer Media]] |date=2009 |accessdate={{start date|2011|9|19}} }}</ref> * ''[[Reservoir Dogs]]'' by Harry Lindley<ref>{{cite web |url=http://bcove.me/krxr0xin |title=Done In 60 Seconds: ''Reservoir Dogs'' |work=[[Empire (film magazine)|Empireonline.com]] |publisher=[[Bauer Consumer Media]] |date=2009 |accessdate={{start date|2011|9|19}} }}</ref> * ''[[Terminator 2: Judgment Day]]'' by Katie Child<ref>{{cite web |url=http://bcove.me/kzgu1tdv |title=Done In 60 Seconds: ''Terminator 2: Judgment Day'' |work=[[Empire (film magazine)|Empireonline.com]] |publisher=[[Bauer Consumer Media]] |date=2009 |accessdate={{start date|2011|9|19}} }}</ref> * ''[[The Fugitive (1993 film)|The Fugitive]]'' by Martin Selby and Tom Marshall<ref>{{cite web |url=http://bcove.me/0xl7unfa |title=Done In 60 Seconds: ''The Fugitive'' |work=[[Empire (film magazine)|Empireonline.com]] ''WALL-E'' |work=[[Empire (film magazine)|Empireonline.com]] |publisher=[[Bauer Consumer Media]] |date=2009 |accessdate={{start date|2011|9|19}} }}</ref>
===Special Awards=== ====Icon Award==== '''[[Viggo Mortensen]]'''<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.empireonline.com/awards2009/winners/empire-icon.asp |title=Empire Icon Award |work=[[Empire (film magazine)|Empireonline.com]] |publisher=[[Bauer Consumer Media]] |date=2009 |accessdate={{start date|2011|9|19}} }}</ref>
====Outstanding Contribution To British Film==== '''[[Danny Boyle]]'''<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.empireonline.com/awards2009/winners/outstanding-contribution.asp |title=Outstanding Contribution To British Film |work=[[Empire (film magazine)|Empireonline.com]] |publisher=[[Bauer Consumer Media]] |date=2009 |accessdate={{start date|2011|9|19}} }}</ref>
====Actor of our Lifetime==== '''[[Russell Crowe]]'''<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.empireonline.com/awards2009/winners/actor-of-our-lifetime.asp |title=Actor of our Lifetime |work=[[Empire (film magazine)|Empireonline.com]] |publisher=[[Bauer Consumer Media]] |date=2009 |accessdate={{start date|2011|9|19}} }}</ref>
====Heath Ledger Tribute==== '''A special tribute award was dedicated to acknowledge the outstanding work of [[Heath Ledger]].'''<ref name="blog"></ref>
